job_description:
• With a mid-year, and year-end review you'll have two windows each year to progress recognizing the pace at which you could grow.
• Join our Graduate Committee and home in on your planning, networking and co-ordination skills.
• We are seeking a driven and technically skilled AI Data Engineer to join our team, supporting analytics and data-driven decision-making across our engineering organization.
• Hold (or are on track to hold) a University degree by the start date.
• Candidates with alternative degrees will also be considered if they have relevant experience.
• A yearly occurrence exclusive for Graduates allowing you to hear from executive members, inspiring speakers and make connections for life.
• Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code (e.
• Excellent problem-solving abilities, self-motivation, and strong communication skills.

• Candidates with alternative degrees will also be considered if they have relevant experience.
• Background in machine learning, computer science, or electrical/computer engineering, with experience designing, training, or analyzing ML models using frameworks like PyTorch or Hugging Face.
• Experienced Professionals At Arm, our research shapes the future of energy-efficient AI.
• Working on interesting new projects with leaders in the field is exciting, but we also know how important it is to receive support.
• That's why throughout your internship, you can expect regular feedback and development opportunities, social activities to connect with your peers, an end of internship celebration, plus the opportunity to be *considered for future Graduate positions (*subject to performance).
• #getreadytogrow Are currently enrolled and studying towards a PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering.
• Efficient, Sustainable, and Optimized AI: Techniques to improve performance, efficiency, and scalability through algorithmic, representational, and system-level innovations.
• We build the foundations of tomorrow’s intelligent systems—from next-generation processors and accelerators to modern ML models and tools.
